items.title: Home First Finance: Scalability with profitability led by solid execution
items.description: Higher valuation could sustain, given risk-adjusted growth

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick – Why this niche FMCG stock merits attention, post correction
items.description: The growth prospects make Emami a good tactical pick as the valuation is among the cheapest in the sector

items.title: International Gemmological Institute (India) IPO: Will bourses certify the gem?
items.description: IGI India operates in the niche category of independent diamond certification and has established leadership position in the fast-growing lab-grown diamond market.

items.title: SpiceJet shares at day's high as airline clears all pending employee PF dues worth Rs 160 crore
items.description: In a press release, SpiceJet said the move 'reaffirms its commitment to employee welfare and financial accountability'

items.title: Brookfield India REIT raises Rs 3,500 crore via QIP issue
items.description: In a regulatory filing on Friday, the company said it has successfully completed a capital raise of Rs 3,500 crore through a qualified institutional placement (QIP) of units. The issue was launched on December 9.

items.title: Infosys acquires 20% stake in healthcare deep-tech firm 4baseCare for Rs 8 crore
items.description: A minority holding, not exceeding 20% of the outstanding share capital of the company, Infosys said
